Uses of Class
com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario.OutlineDescriptor

  • Packages that use OutlineDescriptor 
    Package Description
    com.ckeiner.testbddy.api  
    com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario  

    • Uses of OutlineDescriptor in com.ckeiner.testbddy.api

      Methods in com.ckeiner.testbddy.api that return OutlineDescriptor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> OutlineDescriptor<T> BddSuite.with(T... testdata)
      Creates an OutlineDescriptor with the specified test data.
      static <T> OutlineDescriptor<T> BddSuite.withTypeOf(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
      Creates an OutlineDescriptor without any test data.
      Methods in com.ckeiner.testbddy.api with parameters of type OutlineDescriptor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> ScenarioOutline<T> BddSuite.scenario(java.lang.String description, OutlineDescriptor<T> descriptor)
      Creates a ScenarioOutline with the specified description and descriptor.
      The behavior and test data of the ScenarioOutline is contained in the OutlineDescriptor.

    • Uses of OutlineDescriptor in com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario

      OutlineDescriptor<T> OutlineDescriptor.and(java.lang.String description, java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)

      The keyword of the TypeStep is And.

      The keyword of the TypeStep is And.
      OutlineDescriptor<T> OutlineDescriptor.and(TypeSteps<T> steps)
      Adds all steps of the specified TypeSteps to the steps.
      Note, that the generic type of the parameter has to fit the generic type of this class.
